curl --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id": "curltest", "method": "getblock", "params": ["00000000000002769c2be635f3d08ff27638a28b676df2351029bbad88536fb3", 0]}' -H 'content-type: text/plain;'  https://bitcoin.drpc.org/


curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id": "curltest", "method": "getblockheader", "params": ["00000000c937983704a73af28acdec37b049d214adbda81d7e2a3dd146f6ed09"]}' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:8332/

  -H 'content-type: text/plain;'\
  https://bitcoin.drpc.org/
